      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflection of plane waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion der flachen Wellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion des ondes planes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão de ondas planas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione delle onde piane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση των επίπεδων κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión de ondas planas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how plane waves travelling down the ripple tank are being reflected by a flat metal plate.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flat metal plate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plane waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ripple tank</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">travelling waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave front diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie die flachen Wellen, die 
hinunter den Kräuselungbehälter fortpflanzen, durch eine flache 
Metalplatte reflektiert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment des ondes 
planes voyageant en bas du réservoir d'ondulation sont reflétées 
par un plat plat en métal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como as ondas planas que 
viajam abaixo o tanque do ripple estão sendo refletidas por uma placa
lisa do metal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come le onde piane che 
viaggiano giù il carro armato dell'ondulazione stanno riflettende da 
una piastra piana del metallo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς τα επίπεδα κύματα 
που ταξιδεύουν κάτω από τη δεξαμενή κυματώσεων απεικονίζονται 
από ένα επίπεδο μεταλλικό πιάτο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo las ondas planas 
que viajan abajo del tanque de la ondulación están siendo reflejadas
por una placa plana del metal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flache Metalplatte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flache Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
